name: The Milk Man
description:
>>> DOWNLOAD AT BOTTOM <<< The Milk Man is a Dani themed horror game. A rambunctious refrigerator related accident has finally freed you from your chilly coffin. Playing as a milk carton, you have one chance to collect all seven stickers and escape. But beware of The Milk Man! His thirst for your blood is unquenchable... Ultra-realistic physics based movement! Seven unique stickers with a collection log! One puzzle and one progression locked sticker! Groundbreaking game design challenges! Hardcore mode for a next-level, edge-of-your-seat challenge! AAA standard menu screen with TONS of options! Killer Dani references to fulfill even the most hardcore fans! Intense sound design and visual effects! Nightmare inducing jump-scares! This comment On this video This game tries to be referential to Dani's content. I made this in 4 days. It's janky. There are bugs. If you create public interactions with this game, tag @SamTheSombody or comment below. It's super fulfilling to see people engage with this (I need validation) <3 Like this game? Hit up my: YouTube            Twitter
